metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1589 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Form API in Drupal 7.x before 7.13 allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via crafted parameters in a destination URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
